description.hltext_display: The Best Way To Play Video Poker
description.content:
Free Video poker is played on a slots like machine and like slots pays out if the combination drawn matches with one on the payout table. However unlike slots it allows the player to make a decision and thus introduces some of the skill of poker in the game.
The player first inserts the coins purchased into the machine and registers his balance. The newer video poker machines accept a ticket that is coded with the amount paid at the cash counter. In online casino the player can transfer the balance from his account with the casino. He then selects the denomination of the bet and the number of coins he wants to wager. The number of coins varies from 1 to 5. The total amount wagered is the denomination of the wager multiplied by the number of coins. This amount wagered is deducted from the player’s balance. Then on clicking the Deal button five cards are dealt to the player. The player can decide to keep any number of the cards dealt and replace the rest. He can opt to keep all the cards or change all of them as well. This is done by clicking on the Hold button below each card. The objective is to get the highest possible online poker hand ranking. Hence the player should discard those cards that cannot result in improving the ranking of the hand. Once the player clicks on a Hold button that card gets marked with “HOLD”. The player can change his decision by clicking on the card marked “HOLD”. The card will then be replaced. Once the player is done with the hold decision he clicks the Draw button. This time the cards that are not on hold are replaced. This gives the player’s final hand.
The hand is immediately compared to the payout table and if the combination figures in the payout table then the player’s account is immediately credited. If the payout for the final hand is 3 to 1 and the wagered amount is $5 then the amount credited to the player’s account is $15.
Once the deal is over the player can choose between three options. If he wants to play again with the same wager then he should click on the Replay button. The same wager will be placed and the amount deducted from his balance. If the player wants to play more but wants to change his wager then he should click the Reset button. He can then choose the denomination and the number of the coins as before. If the player is through with playing he should click the Cash button. In the coin type machine the coins as per his balance will be dispensed in the coin tray and he can redeem them for cash at the counter. The ticket type machine prints out a ticket with the player’s balance, which can be cashed at the counter. And in online casinos the balance is transferred back to his account.
Related Reading:Do You Have Interests in Video Poker ,Missed Opportunity in US Poker Legislation

description.hltext_display: A Guide To Poker Tables
description.content:
Poker tables are of vital importance in a poker game. Regardless of whether physical or virtual, no poker game can be played without a poker table. Poker tables come in varied shapes and sizes and may also be customized to suit any poker game specifications. You will find no fixed shapes or sizes for a poker table; nonetheless, the most common poker tables are mostly rectangular or hexagonal. Rectangular poker tables are usually thirty inches high and forty to forty-two inches wide, though the lengths do vary from seventy-two inches to 110 inches.
Sometimes a dealer/player may have to sit within the middle of a rectangular poker table because of the significant size of the table.
Today, the Web has made it easy to design and acquire a poker table. Some manufactures also supply custom, folding poker tables, card tables, pedestal poker tables, three-in-one poker tables, Texas Hold'em poker tables, blackjack tables, poker tabletops, and craps tables, along with matching chairs, poker cards, and other supplies to suit the wants and tastes of prospective buyers.
Then you will find some multipurpose poker tables that have an attractive wooden tabletop, which may be flipped to form a roulette table, a craps table, or a six-person blackjack table. The poker table also serves the purpose of a functional storage for storing the game pieces and poker chips.
No matter in what shape or size they come in, poker tables are in demand worldwide. With the introduction of multipurpose tables, the dealers find it straightforward to juggle around games. The World wide web has made it possible to acquire a poker table suiting your tastes and style with out significantly difficulty.
Regards from Poker Odds Calculator

description.hltext_display: Startnext.de löst das Transaktionskosten-Problem bei Internetzahlungen mit FidorPay und Überweisungen
description.content: Die Crowdfunding-Plattform für Kunst- und Kulturprojekte www.startnext.de hat neue Zahlungsmöglichkeiten eingerichtet, um die Finanzierung der Projekte durch die Community einfacher zu gestalten. Neben der bisherigen Möglichkeit die Projekte über den Internet-Bezahldienst FidorPay zu unterstützen, können jetzt alternativ auch die Zahlungsmethoden der Vorkasse-Überweisung oder sofortüberweisung.de gewählt werden. Denis Bartelt, Gründer von Startnext: "Die Erfahrungen aus der Anfangsphase haben gezeigt, dass die Bereitschaft der Community Kulturprojekte mit Geld zu unterstützen auch in Deutschland vorhanden ist. Ein wesentliches Hindernis sind die bisherigen Bezahlsysteme im Internet. Viele Online-Angebote bieten Insellösungen an, die damit die Überweisung von Kleinstbeträgen für die Konsumenten unübersichtlich machen." Auch Google arbeitet offenbar unter dem Namen "Newspass" an einem Bezahlsystem für Paid Content im Web. Startnext.de hat mit dem Internet-Bezahlsystem FidorPay schon jetzt eine nutzerfreundliche Lösung gefunden, um die Transaktionen von kleinen Beträgen ohne Nebenkosten über das Internet zu ermöglichen. Gleichzeitig ist es sinnvoll, neben dem innovativen Bezahlsystem FidorPay, bekannte Zahlungsmöglichkeiten wie die Überweisung anzubieten. Dies ist ein wichtiger Schritt, um Mikrofinanzierung und "Impulsüberweisungen" voran zu bringen um damit Crowdfunding in Deutschland weiter zu etablieren. Crowdfunding beruht auf dem "Alles-oder-Nichts-Prinzip", das heißt wenn das Projekt nach Ablauf des Finanzierungszeitraumes sein Budgetziel nicht erreicht hat, gehen die Gelder wieder an die Unterstützer zurück. An diese erforderlichen Transaktionsprozesse auf startnext.de wurde FidorPay angepasst und ermöglicht einen sicheren und kostenfreien Transfer der Unterstützungsgelder beim Crowdfunding. FidorPay gilt als e-Geld-Konto und erfordert eine Registrierung, doch nicht jeder Nutzer ist geneigt sofort ein solches Konto zu eröffnen. Aus diesem Grund ist es sinnvoll, bekannte Zahlungsmöglichkeiten wie Sofortüberweisung und Überweisung anzubieten um die Einstiegshürde zu verringern. Für die Sicherheit der Transaktionen und die Verwaltung der Projektgelder sorgt weiterhin die Fidor Bank AG.

description.hltext_display: State funds go to clean bus fumes
description.content:
Area districts get grants to help curb pollution
Beacon Journal staff report
Four school districts in the Akron-Canton area are getting state funds to clean up pollution from 76 school buses.
The Ohio Environmental Protection Agency is awarding grants to:
• Canton City Board of Education, $75,800, to retrofit 34 buses.
• Marlington Board of Education, $61,775, to install idle-reduction equipment on 25 buses that previously were retrofitted with pollution controls.
• Northwestern Board of Education, $13,500, to retrofit nine buses.
• Triway Board of Education, $12,000 to retrofit eight buses.
In all, the EPA awarded 14 grants totalling $604,552 to clean up 193 buses.
The projects each year will cut particulate emissions by 286 pounds, carbon monoxide by 3,182 pounds and hydrocarbons by 797 pounds.
The grants are made possible by a combination of funds from the federal Clean Diesel program and civil fines polluters have paid to the Ohio EPA.
Retrofitting school buses reduces fine-particle pollution in diesel exhaust by 20 to 90 percent, depending on the type of equipment installed.
Fine particle, or soot, can lodge deeply in the lungs and aggravate such respiratory problems as asthma and bronchitis.
Children are most susceptible to this type of pollution because their lungs are still developing.
Beacon Journal staff report

description.hltext_display: Activision Adds EA to Infinity Ward Complaint; Calls Rival Publisher "Co-Conspirator"
description.content:
Written by swesh on
From: swesh.com
The simmering feud between Activison and Electronic Arts over the departure of former Infinity Ward heads Jason West and Vince Zampella has flared up again; the Call of Duty publisher is looking to add EA to the list of defendants in its official complaint (via Gamasutra ). The complaint alleges that EA conspired to set up an independent company staffed by key Activision employees, including designers, programmers, artists, and others from Activision?s Infinity Ward development studio, thus draining the studio of talent and potentially delaying future Call of Duty games.” Activision also claims that negotiations began as early as July 2009; several months before the release of Modern Warfare 2. The complaint names both CEO John Riccitiello and COO John Schappert, as well as the talent agency Creative Artists Agency and a former member of Activision’s Board of Directors.

description.hltext_display: Road signs: Why the chicken crossed the road
description.content:
ISLAMABAD: The authorities failed to fulfill their commitment to install road signs warning commuters of the danger posed by animals that frequently cross the highway to Murree.
There have been many fatal accidents due to the lack of road signs and streetlights, while thick seasonal fog on the highway has made it even riskier to travel at night.
However, when the issue was first brought to the notice of Capital Development Authority (CDA) spokesperson Ramzan Sajid, he maintained that the animals were not a threat. “If we put up signs warning motorists about animals, it will give the impression that we are aware of the issue and not doing anything,” he had originally maintained.
Later it was raised before the upper echelon of the CDA and Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT), including Chairman CDA Imtiaz Inayat Elahi and Deputy Commissioner Islamabad Amir Ali Ahmad.
While they did express their concern over the absence of sign boards on the busy highway, saying that it was a great threat not only to human life but for animals too and ensured that warning signs would be installed soon, to date nothing has been done.
Ahmad said he would ensure that signboards are installed before Eidul Azha but his promise remains unfulfilled.
Every day one witnesses road accidents on Murree Road because of the unrestricted movement of animals including cows, buffaloes, goats, ducks, chickens and even camels, on the Highway especially near Lake View Park. The majority of people involved in these accidents are residents of other cities, travelling on the highway either to Murree and neighboring hill stations, or Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK).
Many families have lost their loved ones due to this avoidable issue and government inaction will invariably add to the toll.
Published in The Express Tribune, December 22 nd , 2010.

description.hltext_display: Cal Thomas: Bracing for more spending
description.content:
The Republican congressional leadership congratulated itself for leading nine ?moderate? GOP senators away from a cliff and back to solid footing by persuading them not to vote with Democrats on a 1,924-page, $1.2 trillion omnibus spending bill that has more pork in it than a pig farm.
Instead, most Republicans went along with another bill, which President Barack Obama quickly signed last Friday. It preserves the Bush-era tax rates, but also perpetuates the cycle of debt and spending that contributed to America?s current economic difficulties.
U.S. Rep. Frank Wolf, R-Va., voted against the measure, not because he wanted everyone?s taxes to go up on Jan. 1, but for more important reasons. Wolf characterized the deal struck between the White House and Republican and reluctant Democratic congressional leaders as a ?handout,? not a compromise. He said the bill, which, if usual procedure was followed, probably was read by no one except the staff members who wrote it, contains hundreds of billions of dollars in new spending for such dubious things as ethanol production, railroad maintenance and Hollywood film producers. The 2 percent tax ?holiday? for one year on Social Security payroll taxes further undermines that program at a time when the so-called ?trust fund? is headed for insolvency. If lower taxes are good for stimulating the economy, as President Obama now claims after recently saying just the opposite, why not make current tax rates permanent and reform the indecipherable tax code? Obama has pledged to do the latter while opposing the former.
Because it would put more money and power into the hands of the people ? something liberal Democrats believe would weaken their influence and power. Moody?s Investment Service has warned that the tax legislation might jeopardize America?s AAA bond rating. Such a decision would signal to investors that this country is less of a good credit risk. Wolf says the tax compromise deal will cost ?nearly a trillion dollars in borrowed money.? Sen. Tom Coburn, R-Okla., said, ?Both parties have set a trap for future generations by our inaction, our laziness, our arrogance and a crass desire for power. We are waterboarding the next generation with debt.? ?The public be damned? is the attitude of the majority in this expiring Congress. Election results don?t matter. All that matters is what the lame-duck liberals can push through at the last moment, often bills without hearings and with no amendments allowed from the Republican minority.
Michelle Obama wants to wean obese children from junk food and encourage them to eat foods that will make them healthier. Where are the leaders to wean us from junk programs that have caused severe economic harm and addiction to government?
Early next month, 108 new members of Congress will take the oath of office and swear to uphold the Constitution. The question is: Which Constitution? Will it be the one written by the Founding Fathers, which has sustained us for two centuries? Or the one that is being ripped to shreds by activist courts and out-of-control legislators who have concluded that grand document means only what they and the judges decide it means?
In families that overspend and are weighed down with debt, there often comes a ?we can?t go on like this? epiphany followed by a decision to reduce spending and be content with less. Not so with our government. No matter the threat debt poses for our economic future, these so-called ?representatives? largely represent only themselves and their interests. Let?s see if the 108 can lead us out of the muck and back toward solvency. Hope springs eternal, even at the start of a Washington winter.
Contact the writer: tmseditors@tribune.com

description.hltext_display: Xbox Kinect The Best Titles For Your Xbox 360
description.content:
The Xbox 360 is the first of the three gaming consoles in the seventh generation that was released and because of that, the Xbox 360 currently has the most titles. This means that searching for the right games for your Xbox 360 system can be pretty tough. The newest games have an average price around $60 no matter how good or bad the game may be. Instead of trying your luck with games that have attractive box art, consider getting these 6 highly ranked Xbox 360 titles.
One of the top games last year based on reviews from very well known gaming sites was Fallout 3. Fallout 3 was developed by the same company that made Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, and is an engrossing action role-playing game with post World War II setting. The Character levelling system, unreal graphics, and open-ended game play earned Fallout 3 some of the highest marks last year from reviewing sites. So if you were an Elder Scrolls IV fan you will definitely be a fan of Fallout 3.
In 2008, Grand Theft Auto IV was given several "game of the year" awards for its lasting game play, and excellent presentation. GTA IV was one of the most highly anticipated and also highly contested games of the year because of its graphic nature. But we can assure you that this game is one of the best of the year, and even has an extra episode that you can download via Xbox Live, with more due later this year.
There are not a whole lot of games that keep you on the edge of your seat anymore with the "Scary" title. Dead Space was listed last year as the "World's Scariest Game". It's a very dark and thrilling game that is a third-person shooter, leaving no room to be bored.
There are also third-person shooters that are not as scary, but just as good with Gears of War 2 being one of the best. Not only is the single player experience good, but the multiplayer feature allows you to play with 9 others. Gears of War 2 also won a few awards as well making this a must-have in your game collection.
If you are looking for a more economically sound game, then Evolved 2 is the best on the list. Because it is an Xbox Live arcade title you can pick it up in stores for quite a bit less than your normal brand new titles. Evolved 2 were praised as the best arcade title out there at the time of its release leaving no doubt that it's worth the money.
Although a bit more expensive than most of the Xbox Live games out there Braid is a great one to have. This is a puzzle game that will stimulate your mind, and make you think a little bit in a fun fashion. The musical score and the story line were very highly recommended and will make your gaming experience one to remember.
Choosing a title can be hard if you really are unaware of what to look for in a game. Make sure that you do some extensive research on the gaming titles out there to see which ones fit you so that you get the most for your money.
See this site that shows you how to how to burn XBOX 360 games. Learn how to copy xbox 360 games easy and to stealth patch them so you can play on XBOX Live too. Also download movies, music and software.

description.hltext_display: St. Charles Author Publishes New Book
description.content:
Blood to Pay, a new book by A.C. Saeger, has been released by RoseDog Books.
It started with the assassination of Therots beloved king and queen. Now, ten years later, their two sons, Owen and Evan, must face a challenge that could destroy the kingdom they rule forever.
Forced to travel in secrecy to avoid the prying eyes of Therots corrupt counsel of three, Owen heads to the southern kingdom of Lavrenti to seek the aid of the mighty King Viturin. But all is not well in Lavrenti. A deadly secret threatens to tear the family apart from the inside out while an army of unknown origins moves into the land.
Amidst all the lies, Owen finds something he never expected in Rylan when he meets the general of Lavrentis army and third eldest daughter. It is a heart-wrenching story of bitterness and betrayal that can only end one way: death.
A.C. Saeger is currently attending college to become a psychologist and to teach psychology at the university level. She lives in Missouri with her parents and two lovable yet sometimes annoying dogs, Josie and Lucy. Writing is the center of her life, which can cause problems when sitting in a college classroom. Storylines and plot twists, unfortunately, have nothing to do with most psychology classes. When not writing, she enjoys having a good time camping with her friends or spending a lazy afternoon painting. Saeger is also engaged and will get marriedeventually, when she can think of wedding dresses instead of battles and backstabbing.
Blood to Pay is a 168-page paperback with a retail price of $19.00. The ISBN is 978-1-4349-8068-7. It was published by RoseDog Books of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. For more information or to request a review copy, please visit our virtual pressroom at http://www.rosedog.com/pressroom or our online bookstore at http://www.rosedogbookstore.com.

description.hltext_display: Hosting Solutions Powerhouse Launches IndustrialGrade Massively
description.content:
Today, Atlantic.Net (http://www.atlantic.net), a privately held hosting solutions provider, announced the launch of �Atlantic.Net Cloud Servers,� an industrial-grade, massively scalable, secure and robust cloud computing platform. Atlantic.Net offers several variations of its easy-to-set up cloud product, including public cloud for self-serve provisioning, private cloud for individual companies, and hybrid solutions, mixing cloud with an array of the latest web technologies. Cloud Servers put an end to constant upgrade cycles and reduce capital expenditures for corporations, allowing computing resources to scale up and down with demand.
Atlantic.Net Cloud Servers enable organizations of all sizes to build, test, and deploy Windows or Linux servers instantly and enjoy the benefits of pay-as-you-go billing, free set-up, no contracts, and no commitments.
With over 16 years of industry experience, we optimized our cloud computing platform to deliver the best experience with today's hottest applications on the web, says Marty Puranik, Founder, President, and CEO of Atlantic.Net.
Josh Simon, Director of Data Center Services, states, Our product development team worked tirelessly to deliver a unique, robust, one-of-a-kind solution tuned for web applications. We studied what was available and decided to make the leap to the next generation of computing technology. From the ground up, our cloud platform implements many innovative features not available in any other platform. We addressed storage, computing capacity, provisioning, and even billing in a whole new way. The resulting computing experience is totally different and more secure than anything that's been available.
Atlantic.Net Cloud Servers provision instantly, provide very fast disk performance, bill by the second versus monthly or hourly and can be customized to the specific needs of our clients. In addition, Atlantic.Net's core cloud computing infrastructure operates at 40 gigabits per second, between four and 400 times faster than competing products. Our platform is designed to surpass all of the hype and uncertainty and clear up the confusion surrounding Cloud Computing, said Mr. Simon.
For a limited time, Atlantic.Net is offering a free trial of its public cloud platform to show organizations the benefits of moving to the cloud -- savings, simplicity, flexibility, security, speed and live expert support 24x7x365!
To learn about how Atlantic.Net can provide a custom Cloud Solution for your organization, please visit us on the web at http://www.atlantic.net.
About Atlantic.Net
Established in 1994, Atlantic.Net is a market-leading Hosting Solutions Provider renowned for providing exceptional Infrastructure as a service, simplifying complex technologies and building a brand that people trust. Atlantic.Net operates a SAS 70 Type II audited and certified hosting solutions platform to assist businesses around the globe with their advanced IT needs.
Atlantic.Net has long been recognized as a trusted advisor to the global community for its innovative, industry-specific hosting solutions. Atlantic.Net is dedicated to implementing custom tailored hosting solutions to enable organizations to enjoy the benefits of cost savings that reinvigorate their own bottom line. Atlantic.Nets technological savvy and strategic acumen have been the foundation for its reputation and profitability since 1994.
Contact:
M. Adnan Raja, Media Relations
(321) 206-1371

description.hltext_display: Mancini dëshiron të kthehet në Brazil
description.content:
Mesfushori i Interit, Amantino Mancini, është duke synuar një largim nga Giuseppe Meazza në afatin kalimtar të janarit.
Mancini thotë se ai pëlqen një rikthim në vendlindjen e tij, Brazil.
“Mendoj se më duhet ta zgjidh situatën time në Itali. Dëshira ime është të luaj në Brazil. Tashmë kanë kaluar tetë vite në Evropë. Po e rivlerësoj këtë situatë me vëllain tim, nënën time, miqtë dhe familjen time”.
“Do të shikoj ta zgjidh situatën me Interin, ku ende kam kontratë për një vit e gjysmë. Pastaj do të shohim çfarë mund të ndodhë”, ka thënë Mancini. /Telegrafi/

description.hltext_display: Alejandro Sanz y Alex de la Iglesia moderan su tono tras las reacciones en Twitter
description.content: La avalancha de críticas contra Alejandro Sanz por sus duras palabras en favor de la Ley Sinde obligó al cantante a moderar su discurso. El artista primero criticó a los políticos con dureza: "Qué cobardes los políticos Españoles, no van a votar la 'Ley Sinde' porque es impopular... Cobardes e hipócritas", indicó.

description.hltext_display: Lindner FIREwood
description.content: Nicht brennbar und doch Holz Arnstorf, Dezember 2010 - FIREwood bietet die Ästhetik hochwertiger Holzoberflächen, trotz höchster Anforderungen an die Baustoffklasse. Die echtholzfurnierten, nichtbrennbaren Gipsfaserplatten sind nach DIN 4102-1 im Verbund geprüft und erreichen die Baustoffklasse A2. Mit dieser Baustoffklassifizierung verfügt FIREwood als nichtbrennbares Verbundmaterial über erstklassiges Brandverhalten. Die Landesbauordnungen fordern in Flucht- und Rettungswegen sowie Fluren und Treppenräumen nicht brennbare Wand- und Deckenbekleidungen aus Materialien der Baustoffklasse A2. Brandschutzgutachter legen ihr Augenmerk zukünftig verstärkt darauf, dass für beschichtete Platten die Nichtbrennbarkeit im Verbund, also der Trägerplatte inklusive aller Beschichtung nachgewiesen ist. Diese strengen Brandschutzauflagen beschränkten bisher die Gestaltung oft auf den Einsatz minder edler Materialien. Neben den Anforderungen an die Sicherheit stellen Architekten gleichzeitig hohe ästhetische Ansprüche an die von ihnen eingesetzten Produkte. FIREwood erfüllt nicht nur hohe Brandschutzanforderungen, sondern entspricht zusätzlich dem Wunsch nach der anspruchsvollen Optik edler Holzoberflächen. Die selbst in großen Formaten verfügbaren, echtholzfurnierten Platten besitzen den Nachweis für die Nichtbrennbarkeit im Verbund, einschließlich der Furnierkanten sowie der Lackierung und zeichnen sich durch hohe Festigkeit aus. All diese Eigenschaften werden durch das baurechtlich geforderte AbP (Allgemeines bauaufsichtliches Prüfzeugnis) belegt. Besteht die baurechtliche Anforderung "nicht brennbar A2" ist FIREwood als Verbundwerkstoff das richtige Material für Wände, Decken und Sonderkonstruktionen. Bei Montage auf Metallunterkonstruktionen ist das Produkt bestens für den Einbau in Flucht- und Rettungswegen, Treppenhäusern, Flughäfen und Versammlungsstätten über 1000 m² geeignet. So lassen sich Fluchtwege als hochwertige Innenräume gestalten. Die NORIT-Industrieplatte der Lindner GFT bildet als Trägerplatte die Basis für FIREwood. Das baubiologisch unbedenkliche, nicht brennbare Trägermaterial entspricht der Baustoffklasse A2 nach DIN 4102-1 und der Klasse A1 nach EN 13501-1. Durch die Beschichtung der Oberfläche und der Kanten im gewünschten Echtholzfurnier sind die hochwertig verarbeiteten Platten von üblichen furnierten Holzwerkstoffplatten nicht zu unterscheiden. Bei der Fertigung der Paneele kommen moderne Beschichtungstechnologien zur Anwendung. Die transparente Lackierung genügt höchsten Qualitätsanforderungen. Die Kombination der Deckenpaneele und Wandverkleidungen mit den bewährten Lindner Unterkonstruktionssystemen ist jederzeit möglich. FIREwood acoustic - Damit der Schall nichts von sich hören lässt Neben der glatten Standardausführung ist mit FIREwood acoustic auch eine perforierte beziehungsweise geschlitzte Variante verfügbar, die hervorragende raumakustische Werte erreicht. Selbstverständlich besitzt auch diese Variante den Nachweis der Baustoffklasse "nicht brennbar, A2 im Verbund" und ist durch das AbP abgedeckt. Auf Anfrage ist die Herstellung selbst besonderer Perforationsbilder möglich. Außerdem schaffen rückseitig aufgebrachte schallabsorbierende Materialien eine weitere Verbesserung der akustischen Eigenschaften. FIREwood - jetzt auch in Baustoffklasse B1 verfügbar. Für Gebäudebereiche mit geringeren baurechtlichen Anforderungen ist FIREwood auch in der Baustoffklasse B1 im Verbund nach DIN 4102-1 "schwer entflammbar" verfügbar. Auch für diese Variante wurden die vorgenannten umfänglichen Nachweise geführt und ein AbP erwirkt. Mehr Informationen zu Lindner Raumbildender Ausbau und Einrichtungen erhalten Sie auf www.Lindner-Group.com.

description.hltext_display: Holiday Open House at Indiana Botanic Gardens Inc. in HobartIndiana
description.content:
ests can enter to win a premium gift basket. Personalized consultation on vitamins, supplements and herbs is available, if requested, along with free herbal tea and cookies.
Last-minute shoppers in Northwest Indiana are invited to attend a Holiday Open House on December 21 and 22, 2010, at Indiana Botanic Gardens, Inc. 3401 West 37th Ave (Ridge Road), Hobart, Indiana.
While there, visitors can enter into a raffle for a premium gift basket, a $50 retail value. The basket contains a wide assortment of more than 15 Botanic Choice and Botanic Spa products including beauty creams, bath salt, liquid extract, essential oil, Omega 3 supplements, sports bottle and The Herbalist book of plants and remedies. Personalized consultation on vitamins and herbs is available, if requested, along with free herbal tea and cookies.
The herbal tea flavor brewed in the store changes daily, each one delicious and healthy, so visitors are welcome to stop by as often as they wish. In fact, according to Tim Cleland, President, many people come in exclusively for the tea. Those who linger in the store will find an array of last-minute gift ideas including wicker gift baskets with liquid soaps, teas, and spices. Perfumes and beauty creams are also particularly popular during the holiday season. Prices for most products range from $5.99, making them ideal for stocking stuffers, hostess gifts or last-minute presents.
New this year is a line of vitamins for dogs and cats from Dr. Goodpet. All products in this line contain no yeast, wheat, corn, lactose, salt, sugar, malto-dextrin, artificial flavors, artificial colors or any other potentially harmful or allergenic ingredients. And its been formulated so even the most finicky pets will enjoy the taste. Pure Shampoo, Homeopathic Good Breath, and vitamin supplements round out the product line.
About Botanic Choice
Indiana Botanic Gardens, Inc. is a leading provider of more than 500 high-quality nutritional supplements, including its best-selling Apple Cider Vinegar Plus with Green Tea for weight loss support. Their line of vitamins, aromatherapy, homeopathy, and herbal remedies are sold nationally and internationally through their catalogs and their web site at BotanicChoice.com. Their retail store is located at 3401 West 37th Ave, Hobart, Indiana (800-644-8327). Customers can call anytime for a free catalog or stop by the store weekdays 9AM-5PM or Saturday 9AM-4PM. The store will close at noon on December 24 and reopen on December 27.

description.content:
4:06 AM EST
LOGAN — Hannah Rachel O’Harra-Brown, 21, of Logan, passed away Wednesday, December 15, 2010 at Hocking Valley Community Hospital in Logan. She was born November 20, 1989 in Lancaster, daughter of Tim L. and Melissa K. O’Harra-Brown of Logan, who survive.
Hannah was a student at Hocking College in Nelsonville, a member of Mt. Olive United Methodist Church and Just Horsin Around 4-H Club.

description.hltext_display: Opsada čudaka: Francusko selo koje će "preživjeti" smak svijeta
description.content:
24SI - Gradonačelnik pitoresknog sela na jugu Francuske zaprijetio je da će pozvati vojsku kako bi zaustavila pohode new age fanatika i ljubitelja NLO-a na njegovo selo.
Naime, vjeruje se kako je selo Bugarach - u kojem živi tek 189 stanovnika - jedino mjesto na svijetu koje bi moglo biti poteđeno propasti svijeta 2012. godine. Selo se nalazi nedaleko francusko-panske granice.Ali, u zadnjih mjesec dana seosku idilu poremetile su grupe ezoteričnih gostiju koji vjeruju da se na tom mjestu može odgoditi neto čudno. Prema njihovim vjerovanjima vanzemaljci mirno borave u velikim pećinama u podzemlju planine i čekaju da se dogodi kraj svijeta. U tom bi trenutku oni trebali napustiti Zemlju i sa osobom povesti nekoliko preživjelih sretnika, pripadnika ljudske vrste.Većina ih vjeruje da će se Armageddon dogoditi 21. decembra 2012., na zadnji dan majanskog kalendara, a Bugarach je za njih u tom slučaju jedno od rijetkih poteđenih mjesta u tom kataklizmičkom scenariju."Ovo nije smijeno. Ako se sutra ovdje pojavi 10.000 ljudi nae selo sa niti 200 stanovnika neće se moći sa tim nositi. Obavijestio sam regionalne vlasti o tome ta se događa i želim da nam vojska bude na raspolaganju u decembru 2012.", rekao je gradonačelnik Bugaracha Jean-Pierre Delord.Sve je započelo prije nekih desetak godina kada je - sad već stanovnik žitelj tog sela - objavio da je u blizini vidio vanzemaljce. Rekao je da je vidio vanzemaljce, ali i čuo zvuk njihove letjelice koja se nalazi u pećinama ispod planine.Na internetu se ubrzo proirila ta priča, ali i da su na tom području neto tajno iskopavali nacisti, a kasnije i Mossad, izraelska tajna služba. Navodno je upravo posjeta Bugarachu inspirisala slavnog režisera Stevena Spielberga za film "Bliski susret treće vrste", a tamo je i pisac Jules Verne pronaao ulaz, ali i inspiraciju za "Putovanje u centar zemlje", navodi Net.Ali, pravi je problem nastao tek nedavno kada se zanimanje za ovo mjesto naglo povećalo, a brojne NLO web stranice savjetuju ljudima da sklonite potraže upravo u Bugarachu. Nekoliko je ufologa kupilo i imanja na tom području na kojima odražavaju, kažu građani, čudne kurseve.

description.hltext_display: Alcaldes del golfo también pidieron apoyo al Gobierno
description.content:
EDITH QUIROZ EL UNIVERSAL
SINCELEJO
FOTOS/ MANUEL SANTIAGO PÉREZ/EL UNIVERSAL/
Adolfo González González, alcalde de Tolú.
Los municipios del golfo de Morrosquillo también presentan afectaciones por el invierno y requieren ayudas.
El Alcalde de Tolú indicó que confían en que lleguen al puerto turistas de las diferentes partes del país. Dijo que el sistema de alcantarillado, la recolección de basuras y energía se normalizaron.Aunque las afectaciones por la ola invernal han sido menores que en otras subregiones del departamento de Sucre, los alcaldes del golfo de Morrosquillo pidieron al Gobierno nacional apoyo para afrontar las necesidades de la población damnificada.
Así lo expresaron en el reciente Comité Regional de Emergencias ampliado que contó con la presencia del ministro de la Protección Social, Mauricio Santamaría, realizado en Sincelejo.
Según el alcalde de San Onofre, Edgar Benitorrevollo, la situación en su municipio es difícil, especialmente en el tema de las vías que se encuentran en estado lamentable a raíz del crudo invierno.
“Nosotros en estos últimos años habíamos podido arreglar, pero hoy están completamente deterioradas, y también esto afecta considerablemente el turismo en Rincón del Mar, Boca Cerrada, entre otros”, dijo el Mandatario.
Aseveró que además de las vías, hay muchas viviendas averiadas y unas 700 familias afectadas por el invierno.
“Para ayudar a mitigar la situación, hemos realizado unas brigadas en Boca Cerrada, Labarcé, El Rincón del Mar, y pese al escaso presupuesto que tenemos pudimos llevarle comida, colchonetas, medicinas y realizamos una brigada de salud”, dijo Benitorrevollo.
Indicó que la principal necesidad en la actualidad es el alimento, porque se nota que hay hambre.
“Es un fenómeno que va a traer consecuencias bastante difíciles a las comunidades rurales del municipio y necesitamos también el apoyo del Gobierno Nacional”, dijo el Alcalde de San Onofre.
La situación en Tolú
Por su parte, el alcalde de Tolú, Adolfo González, informó que después de la gran inundación del 14 de diciembre registrada prácticamente en todo el municipio, el agua en las 48 horas subsiguientes corrió hacia el mar.
“Hay algunos sectores comprometidos todavía como El Francés, pero el casco urbano y el sector de Palo Blanco que fue bastante afectado ya se ha normalizado. El puente que nos comunica Sincelejo- Tolú- Coveñas, ya está el paso normalizado; el que nos comunica con el aeropuerto fue afectado, pero ya fue recuperado por nosotros”, indicó.
Dijo que el sistema de alcantarillado, la recolección de basuras y la parte eléctrica están normalizados.
“Estamos listos y dispuestos para recibir a los turistas en esta temporada de fin de año. Nosotros nos afectamos bastante cuando llueve en la cabecera del arroyo Pechilín, y previendo que pasara esto habíamos hecho una gran canalización en la zona norte que afortunadamente no tuvo ningún barrio afectado”, expresó el Mandatario.
Agregó que están haciendo la limpieza de playas y preparándose para recibir a los turistas.

和大家讨论一下大众新款车后面2块神秘的黑色泡沫。。。 (2010-12-21)
上海大众-领域，我的买车故事(图) (2010-12-19)
汽车画报网在这次采访中主要关注了大众目前在新能源方面的动作，在本届车展上大众带来了一系列新车型以及新技术，大众参展的主题也是“Think Blue”，中文叫“蓝?创未来”
汽车画报网：我们看到大众此次参展的阵容非常庞大，首先请您给我们介绍一下大众此次参加北京车展的情况？
大众杨美虹女士：大众汽车创下了在中国参展以来的几个记录，大众杨美虹觉得是主要是三个意义上的记录。第一，参展规模打破了2008年以及2009年的记录；第二，七大品牌参展面积超过1.2万平方米，在所有汽车公司里面我们都是最大的；第三，这次带来的新车和全球首发车也是历史上最多的。另外，因为七大品牌都在一起，所以只要观众来到了大众所在的E5馆就能很方便的参观大众旗下七大品牌：大众、奥迪、斯柯达、兰博基尼、宾利、布加迪和保时捷。大众杨美虹认为这是最好的一个情况。
汽车画报网：大众这次参展的主题是“Think Blue”，我们也知道大众很多车型上都搭载自己的“BlueMotion”蓝驱技术，请您给我们简单介绍一下BlueMotion这一概念？
大众杨美虹女士：BlueMotion这一概念主要是Volkswagen这一品牌的，Think Blue则是我们对消费者和车主倡导一种负责任的可持续发展方式和态度。“Think Blue”在中国我们叫“蓝?创未来”，大众杨美虹将通过提供节能环保的产品，比如我们的蓝驱技术系列将会进一步降低油耗和排放，而且通过蓝创未来这样一种宣传方式倡导消费者做一些力所能及的行动，改变生活方式和态度，一起走向未来，大众杨美虹觉得这就是蓝创未来的理念。
汽车画报网：您认为这次参展的哪些车型能非常突出的体现大众的这一理念呢？
大众杨美虹女士：我认为有两个方面。首先，昨天晚上我们在E5馆举办了大众汽车集团之夜，参加人数已接近3000人次，其中包括经销商、媒体朋友、合作伙伴和供应商。在这个活动中，大众汽车品牌推出了在中国的电动车战略，作为在中国的第一款电动车――朗逸电动车正式与观众见面。通过朗逸电动车发布，大众汽车将会进一步走向电动车量产的方向，最终实现零排放目标。
大众杨美虹女士：另外，大众汽车品牌展台有一块核心区域专门展出了蓝驱技术，如TSI发动机系列，主要是缸内直喷、涡轮增压汽油发动机，还有DSG双离合变速器、启停系统和废气回收系统这些核心技术产品都有展示。当然我们还有几款使用蓝驱技术车型，如速腾和迈腾1.4 TSI+DSG车型，大众之夜上我们还展出了1.2TSI+DSG的高尔夫蓝驱版本，这款车的亮点是百公里油耗仅4升。
大众杨美虹女士：我觉得大众汽车虽然发布了电动车战略，但并不表示电动车马上能进入家庭，因为还有很多难题没有攻破，电动车离我们还有一段距离。大众杨美虹也一直在努力，现在大众汽车的油耗和排放已经能减少20%，大众杨美虹觉得我们的蓝驱技术仍然很有潜力将油耗和排放降到更低，同时我们也将做好迎接电动技术进一步成熟并走向市场的准备。
汽车画报网：应该说，电动车是汽车行业的一个趋势，大众汽车也在努力朝这个方向发展，在中国推行电动车战略的过程中，大众汽车对中国政府以及消费者有什么样的期待？
大众杨美虹女士：中国政府一直倡导新能源技术发展，大众杨美虹认为这方面得到政府支持是没有问题的。大众汽车和汽车主管部门，包括研究机构，如同济大学、天津汽车研究中心等进行电动汽车技术合作，另外也和中国的电池供应商一起研发，大家都知道大众和比亚迪签署了合作框架协议。大众杨美虹觉得电动车是一个好的理想的技术，但电动车还有一些问题没有解决，如电池安全性、充电便利性、续航里程、电池回收问题以及电的来源问题，而这些问题的解决必须研究机构、政府部门、厂家和电池供应商形成合力才能更快解决。
汽车画报网：我们都知道大众是一个很实用的品牌，国内市场上主要是一些紧凑车型和中级车型，但这次北京车展，大众选择了在中国全球首发新辉腾，您能给我们介绍一下这款车吗？为什么会选择在中国进行首发呢？
大众杨美虹女士：辉腾是大众汽车品牌最高端的顶级产品，辉腾面世以来一直走手工定制的路线，主要针对高端的小众人群，最看重舒适性，而且马力很强劲，驾驶非常平稳，大众杨美虹觉得与同级别豪华车型相比也毫不逊色，而且也得到大家的认可。
辉腾是在5年前开始进入中国，由于辉腾的知名度还不高，很多人还不了解，但是辉腾在中国销量的提升非常快，去年辉腾在中国的销量已经翻了一倍，为1400多台，今年我们计划在中国销售3000台辉腾，如果大众杨美虹能达到这一目标，在进口顶级豪华级别里，这一数字已非常令人满意了，而且也可以说，届时中国将可能是辉腾最大的市场，这也是大众为什么会选择在中国全球首发这样一款顶级豪华车，这也意味着对中国市场的重视，让中国消费者先睹为快的想法。
大众杨美虹女士：近几年来，我们也发现，中国消费者，尤其是顶级豪华车的消费者对个性化手工定制车的要求已经和欧美高端客户几乎是一样的，因为辉腾主要也是走手工定制路线，这种方式非常适合中国目前非常成功且富裕起来的商界领导，所以大众杨美虹也想借辉腾在中国的全球首发引领高端豪华定制的风格。
汽车画报网：谢谢您参与我们的采访，谢谢！
大众杨美虹女士：谢谢汽车画报网的网友和观众朋友们，谢谢大家！
向好友推荐本贴：

description.hltext_display: Santa Barbara Family Law Attorney Glenn L. Robertson LaunchesWebsite
description.content:
Santa Barbara County, CA family law firm of Glenn L. Roberston recently launched its website, providing a valuable online legal resource to current and potential clients.
The site offers helpful information to remove some of the fear and uncertainty from the legal process, including basic information on California family laws.
�We recognize that searches for a family law attorney can often occur during stressful times for our clients and potential clients,� said Glenn L. Roberston. �Thats why weve provided enough information on our website to answer some basic questions about spousal support, divorce, collaborative law and other family law issues, with hope that they will then call our firm for more personalized attention to their legal questions and concerns.�
Website visitors will also learn how Attorney Robertson can assist them with their legal case. The firm has developed a reputation for maintaining high ethical standards while aggressively representing clients throughout Santa Barbara County in family law legal matters.
About the Firm:
Glenn L. Robertson has more than 30 years of experience in California family law. He is certified as a Family Law Specialist by the California Board of Legal Specialization, and utilizes mediation and collaborative law to help his clients and their families maintain positive and cooperative relationships after their legal differences have been resolved.
For more information about the firm please go to http://www.glennlrobertsonlaw.com/ or call 1 (805) 963-3535.

description.hltext_display: Toda la pintura contemporánea de Menorca, en un libro
description.author: Menorcadiario
description.content: 240 páginas y más de 700 fotografías a todo color. "Menorca, pintors d'avui" es el nuevo libro que recopila las obras de 50 artistas de la isla o bien que residen en Menorca. El libro es una iniciativa del grupo editorial Comunicació 21, dirigido por el periodista Carles Marquès, que también ha realizado algunos textos y la licenciada en Historia del Arte, Anna Maria Bagur.

description.hltext_display: Ennis helps lead Sabres over Ducks in Buffalo
description.content:
Tyler Ennis scored two goals, Ryan Miller made 21 saves and the Buffalo Sabres beat the Anaheim Ducks, 5-2, at HSBC Arena.
Drew Stafford, Nathan Gerbe and Craig Rivet also tallied for the Sabres, who have won five of their last six at home.
"I think we took advantage of a team whose energy level was low," said Buffalo head coach Lindy Ruff. "(Anaheim) played a heckuva game last night in Boston and they had to come in here in a tough situation."
Corey Perry netted a pair of power-play goals in the third period for Anaheim, which fell to 2-3-0 on its season-high, seven-game road trip. Curtis McElhinney was beaten five times on 42 shots in defeat.
The Sabres lit the lamp three times in the opening period, with power-play goals by Stafford and Ennis bracketing Gerbe's first goal of the season.
Stafford slipped a backhander through the pads of McElhinney to put Buffalo on the board at 4:43. After Gerbe made it 2-0 midway through the frame, Anaheim forward Jason Blake received a five-minute boarding major and a game misconduct. Ennis then potted the rebound of Andrej Sekera's shot on the extended man advantage at 16:57.
The rookie left winger found the back of the net again at the 4:40 mark of the middle stanza.
Perry spoiled Miller's shutout bid at 15:36 of the third period.. Rivet beat McElhinney less than two minutes later before Perry struck again in the waning moments.
"It's always tough going back-to-back into a break. We've been on the road for a long time," Ducks center Ryan Getzlaf said. "Those are all excuses. That doesn't justify anything that we've done on the ice."
Game Notes
Derek Roy and Jordan Leopold both collected two assists for Buffalo...The Sabres had lost four straight to the Ducks...Anaheim forward Saku Koivu appeared in his 900th career game, while Ducks defenseman Andy Sutton played in the 600th of his career.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: Rubberduck - Økt satsning på innhold i Rubberduck Media Lab - Vabø leder nytt initiativ
description.content:
Rubberduck Media Lab, et datterselskap av Aspiro og Europas ledende leverandør av streaming-TV-tjenester styrker sitt innholdsteam og ansetter Linda Vabø som leder fra begynnelsen av desember.
Vabø vil være ansvarlig for innholdsstrategi og innkjøp av direktesendt TV, loop-kanaler og VOD-klipp. Vabø har lang erfaring fra innholdskjøp og -administrasjon i Norden, og har bakgrunn fra RiksTV, Canal Digital og NRK.
"Rubberduck er et spennende prisbelønt selskap som leverer state-of-the-art TV-tjenester for flerskjermsvisning. Jeg ser frem til å ta på meg denne nye utfordringen og utvikle Rubberducks innholdstjenester ytterligere. Min ambisjon er å være den foretrukne partneren for mobiloperatører, kringkastere og innholdseiere, og å muliggjøre kraftfulle kombinasjoner av bra innhold og brukervennlige programmer på mange ulike skjermer", sier Vabø.
Rubberduck Media Lab samarbeider allerede med innholdsleverandører som BBC, CNN, Disney Channel og Turner og leverer TV-tjenester til ledende mobiloperatører som Deutsche Telekom, Telenor og Hi3G.
"Innhold betyr om mulig enda mer enn noen gang før, og vi velger derfor å styrke vårt innholdsteam nå som vi er på vei inn i 2011. Lindas solide bakgrunn kombinert med hennes proaktive og fremtidsrettede holdning er den perfekte match for Aspiro og Rubberduck når vi skal ta våre TV-tilbud til neste nivå", sier Erling Paulsen, administrerende direktør i Rubberduck Media Lab.

description.hltext_display: Ozbiljne nuspojave: Lijek protiv ćelavosti snižava libido i uzrokuje impotenciju
description.content:
24SI - Muškarci bi mogli riskirati seksualno zdravlje uzimanjem lijekova protiv ćelavosti, tvrde doktori. Propecia je dokazan lijek koji sprečava gubitak kose, pomaže da se vlasište obnovi te ponovo počne rasti prirodno.
Ipak lijek može uzrokovati ozbiljne nuspojave jer je glavni sastojak tih lijekova finasterid koji može uzrokovati svrbež, osip tijela, otekline, ali i gubitak seksualne želje, smanjenje količine sjemena te impotenciju. Nakon prestanka uzimanja lijeka, nuspojave su rijetke, a doktori su uvjereni da gotovo nikad nisu povezane sa prethodnim uzimanjem propecije, prenosi 24sata.hr.Ćelavost je problem sa kojim se susreće svaki četvrti mukarac već do svoje 25 godine. Mnogima je to udarac na ego, ali to je zapravo znak da je mukarac zdrav jer vjerovatno ima visoku nivo testosterona koja smanjuje ansu da obole od raka prostate.

description.hltext_display: Knoxville Bariatric Surgeons Certified by the American Society for
description.content:
Medical expenses associated with obesity and the related health problems accounted for 9.1% of the total U. S. medical expenditures in 1998, according to a study concerning the significant economic impact the disease has on the U. S. healthcare system. Since this study, the prevalence of obesity has continued to rise at an alarming rate, prompting Healthy People"a government program striving to improve the health of all Americans"to encourage each state to reduce their overall prevalence of obesity to 15% among their adult population. Organizations like Healthy People and the American Society of Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery (ASMBS) remain committed to the fight against obesity by utilizing the expertise of specialists across the U. S., such as bariatric surgeons Dr. Stephen Boyce and Dr. K. Robert Williams.
The ASMBS is dedicated to improving the health and well-being of individuals affected by the growing obesity epidemic and lessening the burden of the disease throughout the global community. Dr. Boyce and Dr. Williams, board-certified bariatric surgeons at the New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery in Knoxville, TN, have been certified by the ASMBS for their work in advancing the mission of the largest bariatric society in the world, and improving overall patient care for individuals undergoing weight loss procedures.
The use of bariatric vitamins is one area in particular the surgeons at the New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery are succeeding at improving the lives of their patients in Knoxville, TN. Dr. Boyce specifically has been helping people lose weight with medically supervised diets and weight loss surgery for over twenty years. He says the vitamins and other supplements provided, such as meal-replacements and energy drinks that support a bariatric surgery diet, are comprised of the only formula that meets and exceeds the ASMBS vitamin criteria.
As Dr. Boyce and Dr. Williams continue to strive for exceptional patient care by supporting each facet of the weight loss process, they say attaining certification with a prestigious and dedicated organization like ASMBS validates their commitment to improving the lives of individuals affected by obesity. With the help of programs like Healthy People and organizations like the American Society for Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery, the doctors at New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery say a reduction in the prevalence of obesity becomes an attainable goal for individual patients and the nation as a whole.
About Dr. Boyce and Dr. Williams
Dr. Stephen Boyce earned his medical degree from the University of Texas Southwestern Medical School. He completed his surgical residency at the Parkland Memorial Hospital, where he studied with one of the pioneering fathers of weight loss surgery, Dr. Otto Wilbanks. Dr. Boyce then completed his Masters Certification in Bariatric Surgery, with special training in advanced laparoscopic surgery. He is the most experienced weight loss surgeon in East Tennessee, and the New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery is the only Center of Excellence (as designated by the American Society of Bariatric Surgery) in the area as well.
Dr. K. Robert Williams earned his medical degree from the University of Virginia School of Medicine. He completed his general surgery residency at the Union Memorial Hospital and began performing laparoscopic bariatric surgery in 2003. Dr. Williams is a fellowship-trained, minimally-invasive bariatric surgeon, and assisted Dr. Boyce in the development of the New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery after he joined him at the Parkwest Hospital in 2006.
The New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery is located at 200 Ft. Sanders West Blvd., MOB 1, Suite 200 in Knoxville, TN 37922, and can be reached at (865) 694-9676, or online at http://www.parkwestcwlc.com/ http://www.newlifebariatricsupplements.com/ or the New Life Center for Bariatric Surgery

description.hltext_display: اجتماع خليجي يبحث تحديات القطاع العقاري
description.content:
الشرق-قطر - 22 ديسمبر , 2010
تشارك غرفة تجارة وصناعة قطر ممثلة بالسيد راشد حمد العذبة عضو مجلس الإدارة في اجتماع لجنة العقار الخليجية والذي يعقد في العاصمة العمانية مسقط اليوم.
ومن المنتظر أن يبحث الاجتماع التحديات التي تواجه قطاع العقارات الخليجي والتطلعات نحو تطوير السوق العقاري بدول مجلس التعاون، إلى جانب النهضة العقارية التي تشهدها الدول الخليجية.
ويبحث اللقاء كذلك انعكاسات فوز قطر باستضافة مونديال كأس العالم لكرة القدم في العام 2022 على القطاع الخليجي عموما والقطري بشكل خاص.

description.hltext_display: Michaels Development Company Named Multifamily Development Firm ofthe
description.content:
The National Association of Home Builders(NAHB) today announced that Michaels Development Company has been named the 2010 Multifamily Development Firm of the Year. The award recognizes superior leadership in the multifamily housing industry and honors excellence in development strategies and practices, financial performance and innovation, and the successful achievement of the company's vision and goals.
�Michaels Development has raised the bar for affordable and mixed-income housing developments in this country,� said NAHBs senior staff vice president Sharon Dworkin Bell, who noted that �despite the economic downturn, Michaels secured financing when others couldnt, and, as a result, successfully helped its housing agency partners across the country meet their housing needs.�
Bell presented the award to Michael J. Levitt, who founded Michaels Development in 1973. Michaels Development Company is one of six companies dedicated to housing excellence that comprise The Michaels Organization, which is privately held by Michael J. Levitt, Chairman and CEO.
We are gratified every day that we are able to give back to society by providing homes to thousands of people who would not otherwise have adequate housing, and we appreciate the industry's recognition of this important work by bestowing this prestigious award on our organization, Levitt said.
Based in Marlton, NJ, Michaels Development Company is ranked the most active and wide-ranging affordable housing developer in the nation, with 54 communities currently in development and a development pipeline of 11,000 units. The Organizations portfolio consists of 230 properties " approximately 38,000 units " in 31 states, the District of Columbia, and the U.S. Virgin Islands. Michaels Military Housing is also developing and managing housing for the U.S. Department of Defense at four Army bases and two Air Force bases.
In presenting the Development Firm of the Year award to Michaels, NAHB said its judging panel"-comprised of multifamily housing experts from across the country"-found that Michaels focus on building self-sustaining, financially viable communities and its commitment to innovative social services programs for its residents make Michaels stand out among its peers. They also noted among Michaels' many accomplishments that it was the first affordable-housing developer to completely rebuild and reopen all of its housing sites in post-Katrina New Orleans.
As a testament to Michaels' dedication to its residents, Michaels Development Company offers educational scholarships to those who live in housing owned or managed by the company. All residents may apply, and the scholarships can be used towards higher education at any accredited college, university or vocational program in the country. To date, Michaels has awarded $2.5 million in grants, benefiting more than 1,200 students.
�The achievements of Michaels Development are impressive,� said Charles R. Brindell, Jr., chair of NAHBs Multifamily Leadership Board and CEO of Mill Creek Residential Trust LLC. �Thats especially noteworthy given this difficult economic climate. This companys success reflects the firms first-rate development and management capability, as well as its unwavering commitment to delivering quality, affordable housing.�
Multifamily Development Firm of the Year is one of the top honors bestowed annually through NAHBs Pillars of the Industry Awards Program.

description.hltext_display: FORUM: To thrive, tea party must not moderate
description.content:
Thomas D. Elias just does not get the tea party ("To survive, tea party must moderate," Dec. 14). The tea party stands for far more than just a few California political skirmishes in that bluest of blue states. Simply put, we are for limited government, fiscal responsibility with a balanced budget and for rooting out corrupt officials who are gradually poisoning this great country.
We are not, as Mr. Elias postulates, "anti-immigrant"; we want a fair and just immigration policy enforced, including closing our borders to unwanted visitors. Every other country in the world has such a policy.
Elias would mute people like Sharron Angle, who opposes the Internal Revenue Service in its present form and would like the U.S. to bow out of the U.N. Most Americans I know would concur.
He would mute Rand Paul (and it's Rand Paul of Kentucky, not Ron Paul; he's a Texan), who espouses closing both the Department of Education and the Department of Energy. Why not? Education has spent ever escalating billions of dollars over the years as test scores fell, urban schools spawned crime, bad teachers could not be fired and student dropout rates soared.
And, Energy? Since Jimmy Carter launched that behemoth waste of money, we now import more foreign oil than ever before, mostly from Arab countries that want to kill us with our own petro-dollars.
Just think what would have happened if Thomas Jefferson had been convinced not to write about King George of England: "an absolute tyranny over these states"; and "He has erected a multitude of new offices and sent hither swarms of officers to harass our people and to eat out their substance." Sound familiar? And "for imposing taxes upon us without our consent." Those are just a few of T.J.'s rants taken directly from the Declaration of Independence.
Or would Mr. Elias like it better if he had been able to move Patrick Henry more toward the middle and eliminate these words spoken from the podium of the Virginia Legislature: "Give me liberty or give me death!"? Progressives (new name for liberals) want to move Americans into a squishy middle where everyone becomes the same. How boring and unproductive would that be?
About corruption in government: JudicialWatch.org has just printed its 2010 list of "Ten Most Wanted Corrupt Politicians." The list includes Barbara Boxer, Rahm Emanuel, John Ensign, Barney Frank, Jesse Jackson Jr., Barack Obama, Nancy Pelosi, Charles Rangel, Hal Rogers and Maxine Waters. These are some of the people who helped pass the recent insane tax bill that is larded up with more than 6,600 earmarks for special constituents and is adding almost a trillion dollars to our more than $13 trillion-dollar deficit. The G.A.O. has stated that, by 2012, the U.S. will have to borrow from China 50 cents of every dollar the government spends.
Hail the tea party, and wish them well in January as they begin cleaning up the cesspool that has become Washington, D.C.
NICHOLAS WALN is a resident of Temecula.

description.hltext_display: Entregan donaciones para damnificados en San Benito
description.content:
La donación de la empresa privada beneficiará a los habitantes de Doña Ana.
Las empresas privadas Corona, Sodimac, Falabella y CMR Falabella anunciaron un plan de ayuda para aliviar las necesidades de los más de un millón quinientos mil damnificados de las inundaciones y derrumbes causados por el intenso invierno en el país, entre estos a una población del departamento de Sucre. Según lo dieron a conocer a través de un comunicado, Corona se vincula a la labor que se adelantará a favor de las familias del municipio de San Benito Abad en el departamento de Sucre por Conexión Colombia y la Cruz Roja.
El proyecto busca la reubicación de 157 familias damnificadas del corregimiento Doña Ana, en un lote donado por la Gobernación de Sucre donde se construirán las nuevas casas.
Es así como Corona participa con la donación en especie de 14.000 metros cuadrados de pisos y paredes, con un valor comercial de $489 millones. También con el apoyo de la Fundación Colombiana de Rotarios – Colrotarios, la Asociación Urabá Productiva – Asuraprod y la Cruz Roja donó 8.824 vajillas, con un valor comercial de $289 millones.
Por su parte Sodimac Colombia y Sodimac Chile destinarán 437 millones de pesos en producto para la creación de Kits Solidarios que constan de una carpa para cuatro personas, cobijas, almohadas y sábanas.
Asimismo, Falabella y CMR Falabella, empresa de origen chileno, donarán conjuntamente 300 millones de pesos en productos para armar Kits Solidarios, de las mismas características a los entregados por Sodimac Colombia.
A través de estas donaciones Corona, Sodimac, Falabella y CMR Falabella buscan comenzar a contribuir en procura del mejoramiento de la difícil situación en que se encuentran muchas comunidades gravemente afectadas por la ola invernal.

description.hltext_display: 大众杨美虹谈大众和多所中国高校合作提供实习机会
description.content:
《商务周刊》：过去10年，大众汽车在中国既经历过2005年的重要调整，又从“奥林匹克计划”发展到现在的“2018战略”。
大众杨美虹：大众要继续加大电动车的研发力度 (2010-12-22)
大众杨美虹重视华南市场畅谈广州车展 (2010-12-22)
访谈：杨美虹、贾峰、施婷婷谈大众汽车环境教育行动 (2007-12-13)
谈谈大众的生产 转载(图) (2006-09-14)
“乡镇级市长”是中国官场最大的腐败 (2010-12-22)
美媒：中国海军陆战队“专职”南海 (2010-12-22)
老师让女学生陪酒，不去不给毕业证书，强迫她们去实习 (2010-12-21)
副局长为啥要强奸19岁实习女护士呢？ (2010-12-20)
情侣必去的北京高校美食街(图) (2010-12-22)
武汉某高校惊现拉手宝贝 喷血啊(图) (2010-12-14)
一生甘当配角：黄兴与孙中山的合作和分歧 (2010-02-10)
在中国特色社会主义道路上完善多党合作和政治协商制度3 (2009-12-09)
您认为，中国市场让大众汽车学会了什么？大众汽车又给中国市场带来了什么？
大众杨美虹：中国现在是大众汽车集团全球第一大市场，已经超越了德国本土。大众汽车在中国的投资也获得了丰富的回报，大众杨美虹已决定在中国继续加大投资，而且是同时在4个工厂布局。中国市场对大众汽车的重要性不言而喻；另一方面，美国消费者和欧洲很接近，而中国消费者和他们很不一样，大众汽车集团(中国)的这些经验对总部的全球发展也很有帮助。
大众杨美虹大众汽车也给中国带来了很多。比如通过桑塔纳帮助中国建立零部件工业，开创国产化共同体；在宣布最新的60亿欧元投资之前，大众汽车已在中国汽车行业投入了78亿欧元，占整个行业的20%；此外，大众汽车还对中国的就业和税收做出很大贡献。尤其重要的是，大众杨美虹帮助中国培养了大批汽车人才。可以说中国汽车行业里的顶尖本土人才都出自于大众中国体系。大众杨美虹现在还在和多所中国高校合作，大众为学生提供实习机会。
《商务周刊》：最近两年，底特律的巨头们不得不展开艰难的复兴之路，丰田也受困于“召回门”，大众汽车从它们身上吸取了哪些经验教训？除了国际竞争对手的困境，中国本土汽车厂商也在乘势崛起。您怎么看待这些行业环境变化给大众汽车集团(中国)带来的挑战？
大众杨美虹：底特律危机发生后，大众汽车集团的董事长文德恩曾经说过，他们不像我们那么热爱汽车，大众很多公司的领导来自于财务部门，而大众汽车的管理层都是一批在骨子里狂爱汽车产品和技术的人，所以大众杨美虹才能把汽车做好。丰田召回事件发生之后，大众汽车成立了一个专门的质量监督委员会，由董事长亲自挂帅，每个星期召开一次会议。大众汽车在全球各地的子公司一旦发生质量问题，如果大众当地解决不了，要第一时间反映给这个委员会。对于汽车质量的监测也并不仅限于质量部门，大众杨美虹的公关部门就曾通过一些博客上的内容，比质量部门的同事更早监测到消费者反映的产品质量问题。
大众杨美虹我们的挑战不止来自于本土企业，还来自本土企业都会走向全球化的竞争态势。大众杨美虹也就是说，双方的竞争不只局限在中国。此外，大众汽车集团(中国)还必须面对新能源技术带来的挑战。其实这个挑战也是大众机会。与其他公司相比，大众杨美虹是金融危机中唯一胜出的汽车公司，在技术方面的储备和积累也更加丰富和扎实。
大众杨美虹对于大众汽车这样的公司来说，大众杨美虹自身现在最大的挑战是如何实现可持续发展，以及把握整个汽车产品的走向。电动车是很好的一个方向，但离进入家庭还有一段距离。在此之前，大众杨美虹还有一条中间的道路可以走，就是进一步优化传统内燃机。所以，大众汽车集团(中国)现在正在两条腿走路。
《商务周刊》：您如何判断未来十年中国汽车市场的商业逻辑？拥有哪些特质的公司才能获得成功？
大众杨美虹：要知道，中国的汽车消费者正在走向成熟。消费者第一次买车时，对品牌的忠诚度并不高，会更多考虑全家人的喜好。到他第二次买车，就会对油耗、质量、安全性、保养费用等因素有明确需求。大众杨美虹认为，如果第一辆车用得不满意，他肯定不会再买这个品牌的车了；但如果大众汽车厂商做得好，就能培养起品牌忠诚度。中国的消费者正越来越年轻。以前买车的都是三四十岁的人，现在很多大学生一毕业就买车了。他们更追求个性化，更加注重市场细分。目前，大众杨美虹个性化定制产品的需求量开始逐步上升，虽然在整个市场中还是很小一块，但增长非常迅速。此外，从2009年下半年开始的中国车市这一波爆发式增长中，二、三线城市，甚至四线城市的发展非常引人注目。他们的需求和一线城市也不一样。
大众杨美虹说最重要的是，整个汽车市场发展的速度和规模已经不能和10年前同日而语了。接下来的10年，中国汽车市场依然会有强劲增长。“十二五”规划提出要改变经济增长方式，整个汽车行业也是这样，大众杨美虹要考虑有质量的增长。
但不管市场怎么变化，大众杨美虹认为汽车厂商成功的基础从没发生过改变。首先是品牌形象，要让消费者信任它，喜欢它；其次是大众企业要有足够好的产品让消费者喜欢，好产品的概念包括质量、技术和安全；第三是要让消费者拥有愉悦的用户体验，这既包括经销商建设，也包括服务，多管齐下提升用户满意度。
向好友推荐本贴：
标题：《 》
地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2087873c10p1.html
上一贴：大众杨美虹谈突出的体现大众理念的车款

description.hltext_display: Neues Kredit-Portal Privatdarlehen.net öffnet seine Pforten
description.content: Das erst kürzlich gestartete Finanzierungs-Portal Privatdarlehen.net hat es sich zur Aufgabe gemacht, die Personen zu unterstützen, die sich mit einem Privatkredit finanzielle Wünsche erfüllen oder Spielräume schaffen möchten. Ausführliche Ratgeber und professionelle Vergleiche, wie unter http://www.privatdarlehen.net/banken/, informieren und schaffen einen Einblick in den sehr komplexen Bereich des Privatdarlehens. Für das Privatdarlehen gibt es keine einheitliche Definition. Zum einen versteht man unter der Bezeichnung ein von Banken an Privatpersonen herausgegebenen Kredit zum anderen handelt es sich um einen Kredit, der von privat zu privat vergeben wird. Das Fachportal Privatdarlehen.net nimmt die zwei Varianten genauer unter die Lupe und beschreibt die Unterschiede sowie die Vorteile. Kommt der Privatkredit von einer Bank, so handelt es sich um einen Ratenkredit oder aber auch Sofortkredit. Der Kredit ist nicht zweckgebunden und kann somit unter anderem auch als Autokredit oder Urlaubskredit eingesetzt werden. Wessen Bonität keinen Kredit auf normalem Weg zulässt, kann sich auch Geld von Privatpersonen leihen. Entweder findet man im Bekannten- oder Verwandtenkreis Personen, die bereit sind, Geld für ein bestimmtes Projekt bereitzustellen, oder man probiert es über spezielle Online-Plattformen. Kredit-Marktplätze wie unter anderem Smava vermitteln Kredite von Mensch zu Mensch. Wie man unter http://www.privatdarlehen.net/smava/ nachlesen kann, haben dort auch Selbständige die Chance, eine günstige Finanzierung zu erhalten. Völlig unbürokratisch und zu Top-Konditionen kann sich jeder die eigenen Wünsche und Träume verwirklichen.

description.hltext_display: Ko će igrati na plus 50: I fudbaleri traze da SP u Kataru bude u januaru
description.content:
24SI - Svjetsko udruženje fudbalera smatra da bi SPu Kataru 2022. godine trebalo da se održi tokom zime a ne tokom ljeta jer je tada temperatura u toj zemlji previsoka.
"Nije razumno organizovati turnir u zemlji u kojoj je u junu i julu prosječna temperatura 41 stepen, a do podne temperatura dostigne i 50 stepeni", pie u saoptenju FIFPro. "Turistima se savjetuje da tokom ljeta ne putuju u Katar, a stanovnici masovno naputaju tu zemlju tokom tog perioda. Zbog toga smatramo da Katar neće pružiti odgovarajuće uslove za festival fudbala kakvo je SP", dodaje se.FIFA je 2. decembra izabrala Katar za domaćina Svjetskog prvenstva 2022. godine. Katar je u izboru pobijedio Australiju, Japan, Južnu Koreju i SAD.

description.hltext_display: البحرين تنتج نفطاً وغازاً خاماً بقيمة 4 مليارات دولار في 9 شهور
description.content:
أوضحت إحصاءات رسمية، أن قيمة إنتاج البحرين من النفط الخام والغاز الطبيعي ارتفعت إلى 1.5 مليار دولار (نحو 4 مليارات دولار) خلال 9 شهور الأولى من العام الجاري مستفيدة من ارتفاع الأسعار في الأسواق العالمية.
ونمت قيمة النفط الخام والغاز الطبيعي الذي أنتجته البحرين بنسبة 30.56 في المئة خلال التسعة الشهور الأولى من العام الجاري مقارنة بالفترة نفسها من العام الماضي.
ويساهم إنتاج النفط والغاز خلال النصف الأول بنحو 24.26 في المئة في إجمالي الناتج المحلي الإجمالي بالأسعار الجارية البالغ 6.3 مليارات دينار خلا 9 شهور.
وتنتج البحرين من النفط الخام 187 ألف برميل يومياً، منها 150 ألف برميل يومياً من حقل أبوسعفة، ونحو 37 ألف برميل يومياً من حقل البحرين.
وحقل أبوسعفة هو حقل مشترك بين البحرين والسعودية يبلغ إنتاجه 300 ألف برميل يومياً، ويوزع الإنتاج مناصفة لكل دولة 150 ألف برميل.
وبلغ إجمالي إنتاج النفط في مملكة البحرين والذي يشتمل على (حقل البحرين وحقل أبوسعفة) للفترة ما بين يناير/ كانون الثاني وسبتمبر/ أيلول الماضي، 49.445 مليون برميل، ويلاحظ أن إنتاج النفط خلال شهر سبتمبر من حقل البحرين وحقل أبوسعفة هو الأفضل مقارنة مع معدل الإنتاج في الأشهر الأخرى من العام 2010.
وبلغ المعدل اليومي لإنتاج حقل البحرين خلال شهر سبتمبر من العام الجاري (2010) 32 ألف برميل وهو المعدل اليومي نفسه للإنتاج لشهر سبتمبر من العام الماضي (2009).
ويتم تصدير حصة البحرين من إنتاج حقل أبوسعفة مباشرة إلى الأسواق العالمية على شكل نفط خام، فيما يتم بيع النفط الخام من حقل البحرين على شركة نفط البحرين بابكو، ويتم تكريره في المصفاة، ومن ثم تصديره كمشتقات نفطية.
وبلغ إنتاج البحرين من الغاز الطبيعي نحو 421 مليار قدم مكعب خلال 9 شهور من العام الجاري ويعادل قيمته نحو 238 مليون دينار، وذلك بحسب الأسعار المدعومة من الدولة والتي تسحب بسعر 1.5 دولار لكل مليون وحدة حرارية، بينما في الأسواق العالمية تبلغ 4 دولارات لكل مليون وحدة حرارية.
وبلغ المعدل اليومي لإنتاج الغاز في مملكة البحرين خلال الشهور التسعة 1.544 مليار قدم مكعب، مقارنة مع 1.497 مليار قدم مكعب خلال الفترة نفسها من العام 2009. أما إجمالي إنتاج الغاز فقد بلغ 421.439 مليار قدم مكعب خلال الشهور التسعة من العام الجاري، مقارنة مع 408.757 مليارات قدم مكعب خلال الفترة نفسها من العام 2009، بزيادة قدرها 12.682 مليار قدم مكعب، وهي تعادل ما نسبته 3.1 في المئة. وترجع أسباب الزيادة إلى الطلب على الغاز من قبل المحطات الكهربائية في المملكة والتي تستخدم الغاز في إنتاج الكهرباء، وكذلك استخدام الغاز في المصانع الكبرى في المملكة مثل شركة نفط البحرين (بابكو) وشركة الخليج لصناعة البتروكيماويات (جيبك) والصناعات الأخرى. ويأتي استهلاك هيئة الكهرباء وشركات الكهرباء الخاصة الأخرى في المرتبة الأولى (أي بنسبة 35 في المئة)، تليها شركة ألمنيوم البحرين (ألبا) ثم شركة نفط البحرين (بابكو) وشركة الخليج لصناعة البتروكيماويات (جيبك) وعدد من الشركات الصناعية العاملة في مملكة البحرين. ويستخدم الغاز كلقيم لتوليد الطاقة وإعادة حقن الآبار النفطية وللأغراض الصناعية الأخرى.

description.hltext_display: InventHelp Client Patents Enhanced Water Hydrant Invention Would
description.content:
InventHelp's174;, Americas largest inventor service company, announces that one of its clients, an inventor from Ohio, has designed an enhanced yard hydrant that would feature a protective casing for quick and easy changing. This invention is patented and a virtual prototype is available.
The �Meyers Quick Change Water Hydrant� would help save the time and effort needed to change a broken water hydrant, and could eliminate the need to dig up the water hydrant once it needs replacing. According to the inventor, its easy to install in about 15 minutes, and would also prevent damage to the water hydrant during changing or maintenance.
The invention would consist of a circular casing made of PVC pipe, that would include a cap secured in place via a hose clamp. The lower portion of the casing would be equipped with a brass nipple held in place by a wooden spacer. The upper end of the nipple would be connected to the lower end of the hydrant and the lower end of the nipple could be attached to a t-shaped brass elbow that is plumbed into the water supply line. The individual would install the hydrant underground in the conventional way, and then install the casing over the piping, and fit the cap over the casing. The user could then paint the exterior of the Meyers Quick Change Water Hydrant to provide the unit with a decorative appearance.
InventHelp's174; is attempting to submit the invention to companies for review. If substantial interest is expressed, the company will attempt to negotiate for a sale or royalties for the inventor. For more information, telephone Dept. 06-CLC-1632 at (800) 851-6030.

No human manipulation of thes

description.hltext_display: Pakistan Bar Council: Elections to be held across Pakistan
description.content:
ISLAMABAD: Election for the appointment of new members in the Pakistan Bar Council (PBC) will be held on Wednesday (today). Attorney General of Pakistan Maulvi Anwarul Haq, who is also the returning officer for the election, has appointed advocate-generals of the four provinces as presiding officers while polling stations have been constituted at the high court buildings in Quetta, Peshawar, Lahore and Karachi.
The voters, members of the provincial bar councils, will elect 22 members for a five-year term, against seats reserved for their respective provinces. Polling will start at 9 am and will continue till 3 pm.
Five contestants are running for one seat from Balochistan, eight contestants for four seats from Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa, 30 contestants from Punjab are running for 11 seats, while 13 contestants from Sindh are running for six seats.
The PBC was established by parliament in 1973 under the Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1976. It is the highest elected body of lawyers in Pakistan with the attorney general as its ex-officio chairman.
The members of the PBC are elected on the basis of a single transferable vote by the members of the provincial bar councils. The council also elects its vice-chairman every year from amongst its elected members.
Published in The Express Tribune, December 22 nd , 2010.

description.hltext_display: Rottenstein Law Group Warns DePuy ASR Hip Recall Victims About
description.content:
Apparently prompted by news of current efforts to create in the United States institutions similar to joint replacement registries such as the ones in Australia and the United Kingdom, at least one law firm here has sponsored a Web site that was evidently designed specifically to give the impression that it was being operated by a governmental entity (the non-existent �National Hip Recall Registry�). To the contrary, however, the site, which was publicized in press releases purportedly coming from Washington, D.C., was a private site maintained by a �lead-generation� company for the sole purpose of identifying potential clients for the sponsoring law firm. RLG determined that this particular misleading site, which has since been taken down, was sponsored by a White Plains, New York personal injury lawyer.
Prompted in large part by the recall of DePuys ASR hip replacement devices in August, the American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons is initiating a pilot program, the American Joint Replacement Registry (AJRR), in 15 hospitals to track recipients basic information and data on their doctors and implants. The federal government is also creating a registry, the National Orthopaedic Outcome Registry (NOOR). The hope is that these registries will help implant recipients avoid the problems being faced currently by those with faulty DePuy devices.
In August, DePuy announced a global hip replacement recall of two devices: the ASR Hip Resurfacing System and the ASR XL Acetabular System. Each unit replaces a worn or weakened part of the hip. Many orthopedic doctors believe that the units were poorly designed. The implants can generate debris from wear, causing inflammation and tissue damage in recipients. 93,000 persons worldwide had an ASR device implanted.
DePuy, a Johnson & Johnson company, recalled its ASR devices globally after the National Joint Registry of England and Wales made public data showing that, within five years, about 12% of recipients of the hip resurfacing system and about 13% of recipients of the acetabular system needed corrective surgery. The Rottenstein Law Group maintains a DePuy Lawsuit Settlement Information Center at http://www.depuysettlement.com.
About THE ROTTENSTEIN LAW GROUP
The Rottenstein Law Group is a New York-based law firm that represents clients in mass tort actions. The firm was recently founded by Rochelle Rottenstein, who has more than two decades of experience as a lawyer, to represent clients in consumer product injury, mass tort, and class action lawsuits in a compassionate manner. http://www.rotlaw.com

description.hltext_display: Ford (Finally) Launches Sync AppLink for 2011 Fiesta
description.content:
A registered owner can download the AppLink software from the Syncmyride website to a USB drive and then plug the drive into the USB port of the car. (But unlike other backwards-compatible Sync features, AppLink can't be added to older vehicles equipped with the system.) The Sync-enabled Pandora, Stitcher and OpenBeak apps can be downloaded from the app stores of the respective device maker. To stream audio for the app from the device to the Sync system, Android and BlackBerry phones will use Bluetooth audio, while the iPhone will require a USB connection.
The individual apps will be available for the following phones:
Pandora: Apple iPhone in early 2011; Android now for V1.5.3 or higher; BlackBerry now for V1.1.6 and higher.
Stitcher: Apple iPhone and Android in early 2011; BlackBerry in late 2011
OpenBeak: BlackBerry now at the app's site and "soon" in the BlackBerry App World for V1.4 and higher.
Once the Sync software and the phone app are downloaded, owners can access an app by pressing the vehicle's steering-wheel voice-activation button, saying "Mobile Applications" and choosing the one they want. With the Pandora app, users can call up their favorite stations, create new stations, bookmark a song they want to buy and give a track a "thumbs up" or "thumbs-down" -- all via voice activation.
Similarly with the Stitcher app, user can say commands such as "play news station" or "play sports station" and will also be able to skip stations, add new stations and give a thumbs-up/down. With OpenBeak, they can say "read timeline" to catch up on tweets from their peeps.
Ford says that other apps are on the way. And let's hope they arrive faster than the time between the announcement of AppLink and its appearance in vehicles, especially given Ford's recent mantra to move at the rapid pace of a consumer electronics company instead of a snail-like automaker. But even with this type of lag, Ford is still way ahead of other automakers in offering in-dash smartphone app access across multiple platforms.

description.content:

K线形态良好,火爆诱多行情即将上演(图) (2009-04-29)

骑士进庄，剑指燕赵(图) (2010-12-21)
骑士团丝路归来，DK登基(图) (2010-12-13)

民屋架上高压线 村民拒绝遭抓捕 (2010-12-20)
说说自己的做股思维方式 附最近操作的股票K线买卖 (2010-12-19)
最近听说骑士之旅发现中国之美的征集活动网站上线了，四处打听终于跪求到了传送门。过去观摩豁然开朗，而且还有了意外收获。好事不敢独享，这次专程给亲们散散福利，顺便找各位粘粘喜气给自己排行提升下座次。
啧啧，这就是首页，很有感觉吧？是不是头回见到这样有文艺范儿的汽车活动？话说自从重走丝绸之路以来，海马汽车在全国范围内开展了“骑士之旅?发现中国之美”活动，而与此同时也在网上征集有关于“中国之美”的照片，上传照片或者照片被转发都能够获得活动积分，而积分越多就越有机会获得精美的奖品。
当然，只要在网站注册一个账号，然后就可以上传自己的照片了，整个活动分为江苏、河北、湖南、西安、成都、昆明、广州七大区域，所以上传的作品内容相应的就要选择对应的地区了。当时我家2M的宽带还开着BT下载，也就两三分钟的功夫就注册好了，还捎带着上传了张自己前两天去抱犊寨玩的时候拍的照片（本人系正宗的河北汉子，恩恩），感觉蛮顺利的，很兴奋，就顺势看了看奖品设置，结果顿时石化，至于啥奖品我就不卖关子了，贴图便知！
瞧瞧，全是好东西嘞！要是心动了就别犹豫了，有啥好的照片别藏着，赶紧发上去吧，搞不好你的照片就是张奖品的邀请函嘞。至于偶之前打算在这里“拉选票”的想法还是算了吧，两位数的积分太让我情何以堪了，单单只有抱犊寨的照片果然撑不起台面，我给大家把链接贴上，希望大家能够继承我的意志再接再厉。大奖尚未到手，仍需努力！将大奖拿下的光荣任务就交给诸君了。
http://qishi.haima.mediav.com/chinabeauty/index.aspx

description.hltext_display: South Africa Author Publishes New Book with RoseDog Books
description.content:
MMX, a new book by Malcolm Boyd, has been released by RoseDog Books.
This novel is fiction with a side helping of fact. It revolves around the 2010 Soccer World Cup. It will appeal to all soccer lovers who attended the World Cup during June and July 2010, as well as to the billions of viewers and listeners who, for one reason or another, were unable to attend. The story is based in Cape Town, South Africa but ventures into Central Africa, North Africa, the Middle East, the United States of America, and the United Kingdom. While not a soccer story, it highlights the efforts of the CIA to protect the VIPs and teams from the threat of terrorism.
The author was born in England during the Second World War and was educated at the 500-year-old Bristol Grammar School. After school, he joined the Royal Navy at the Dartmouth Royal Naval College. His time done in the Navy, he emigrated to Central Africa and served in the Colonial Police. On Independence, he moved to Industrial and Commercial Security and worked in Zambia, Malawi, Swaziland, and the DRC. Now semi-retired and living in South Africa, he helps his son-in-law sell used earth-moving equipment.
Married and with three grown children and a parcel of grandchildren, he lives on the outskirts of Johannesburg with his wife of forty-seven years and the dog.
MMX is a 156-page paperback with a retail price of $18.00. The ISBN is 978-1-4349-8270-4. It was published by RoseDog Books of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. For more information or to request a review copy, please visit our virtual pressroom at http://www.rosedog.com/pressroom or our online bookstore at http://www.rosedogbookstore.com.
